name: Caves Ablaze
description:
Caves Ablaze

In Caves Ablaze You are a newborn flame rising up through the darkest of caves. You have one mission and one mission only, to get yourself to the surface. Blaze through the different levels and overcome obstacles in your way. 

Compete against your friends and see who beats the high score! 

 Be safe and don´t burn out!

Controls

A/D or Joystick to Move 

Space or X (PS controller) / A (Xbox Controller) to Jump

Left Shift or R2 (PS controller) / RB (Xbox Controller)  to Dash

R to Respawn

Credits Artists

Alexander Höglind (ArtStation)

Annika R-Burgwall (ArtStation)

Sebastian Claesson (ArtStation)

Programmers

Music & Sound
